title: Can't post in other boards
body:
So I don't know how this works, but I've been playing this game for 4 years now and can't make any posts or leave comments on any other board (except for this one, for whatever reason). Says I have to be level 7. I don't get it.

Feel free to disregard if post is irrelevant.

replies.body: Posting here, or using the Syncing Tool stickied at the top will manually force a sync between your Boards and Summoner level. Looks like this did the trick!
